Package ohos.agp.components

Class DirectionalLayout.LayoutConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.components.ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig
      • ohos.agp.components.DirectionalLayout.LayoutConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable
    Enclosing class:
    DirectionalLayout

    public static class DirectionalLayout.LayoutConfig
extends ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig
    Specifies layout parameters of a child control.
    Since:
    3

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      int alignment
      Indicates the alignment of the child component.
      static int UNSPECIFIED_ALIGNMENT
      Indicates a alignment value that has not been set.
      static float UNSPECIFIED_WEIGHT
      Indicates a weight that has not been set.
      float weight
      Indicates the weight of the child component.

      • Fields inherited from class ohos.agp.components.ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig

        height, MATCH_CONTENT, MATCH_PARENT, width

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      LayoutConfig​()
      Default constructor used to create a LayoutConfig instance with the width and height set to ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig#MATCH_CONTENT by default.
      LayoutConfig​(int width, int height)
      A constructor used to create a LayoutConfig instance based on the specified width and height.
      LayoutConfig​(int width, int height, int alignment, float weight)
      A constructor used to create a LayoutConfig instance based on the specified width, height, alignment, and weight.
      LayoutConfig​(ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig source)
      A constructor used to set layout parameters based on the width and height of the source layout.
      LayoutConfig​(DirectionalLayout.LayoutConfig source)
      A constructor used to set layout parameters based on the width, height, margin, alignment, and weight of the source layout.
      LayoutConfig​(Context context, AttrSet attrSet)
      A constructor used to create a LayoutConfig instance based on the context and attribute set.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class ohos.agp.components.ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig

    • Field Detail

      • UNSPECIFIED_ALIGNMENT

        public static final int UNSPECIFIED_ALIGNMENT
        Indicates a alignment value that has not been set.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • UNSPECIFIED_WEIGHT

        public static final float UNSPECIFIED_WEIGHT
        Indicates a weight that has not been set.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • alignment

        public int alignment
        Indicates the alignment of the child component.

      • weight

        public float weight
        Indicates the weight of the child component.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LayoutConfig

        public LayoutConfig​()
        Default constructor used to create a LayoutConfig instance with the width and height set to ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig#MATCH_CONTENT by default.

      • LayoutConfig

        public LayoutConfig​(Context context,
                    AttrSet attrSet)
        A constructor used to create a LayoutConfig instance based on the context and attribute set.
        Parameters:
        context - Indicates the application context.
        attrSet - Indicates the attribute set to be used.

      • LayoutConfig

        public LayoutConfig​(int width,
                    int height)
        A constructor used to create a LayoutConfig instance based on the specified width and height.
        Parameters:
        width - Specifies the width, which can be a particular value, or ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig.MATCH_PARENT or ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig.MATCH_CONTENT.
        height - Specifies the height, which can be a particular value, or ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig.MATCH_PARENT or ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig.MATCH_CONTENT.

      • LayoutConfig

        public LayoutConfig​(int width,
                    int height,
                    int alignment,
                    float weight)
        A constructor used to create a LayoutConfig instance based on the specified width, height, alignment, and weight.
        Parameters:
        width - Specifies the width, which can be a particular value, or ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig.MATCH_PARENT or ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig.MATCH_CONTENT.
        height - Specifies the height, which can be a particular value, or ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig.MATCH_PARENT or ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig.MATCH_CONTENT.
        alignment - Specifies the alignment value.
        weight - Specifies the weight value.

      • LayoutConfig

        public LayoutConfig​(ComponentContainer.LayoutConfig source)
        A constructor used to set layout parameters based on the width and height of the source layout. The margin, alignment, and weight are set to default values.
        Parameters:
        source - Specifies parameters of the source layout.

      • LayoutConfig

        public LayoutConfig​(DirectionalLayout.LayoutConfig source)
        A constructor used to set layout parameters based on the width, height, margin, alignment, and weight of the source layout.
        Parameters:
        source - Specifies parameters of the source layout.
